content.en: Mobile Health Apps: Researchers have explored the potential of using mobile health applications to improve diabetes management and self-care. They have investigated various questions, such as whether cell phone-based software systems or web-centric environments can enhance clinical outcomes and patient satisfaction. While some studies attribute the agency of algorithms to specific companies like WellDoc™ Communications, Inc., most research does not specify the agency of the algorithms used in these mobile health interventions.
content.da: Mobile Health Apps: Forskere har undersøgt potentialet i at bruge mobile sundhedsapplikationer til at forbedre diabetesstyring og selvpleje. De har undersøgt forskellige spørgsmål, såsom om mobiltelefonbaserede softwaresystemer eller webcentriske miljøer kan forbedre kliniske resultater og patienttilfredshed. Mens nogle studier tillægger algoritmernes virkning til specifikke firmaer som WellDoc™ Communications, Inc., angiver de fleste undersøgelser ikke, hvilken instans der står bag de algoritmer, der anvendes i disse mobile sundhedsinterventioner.
